name: Pick.it Supplies
description: I worked with three regional hospitals among a team of UPenn students to build an order fullfillment and tracking web and mobile app to reduce waste and increase ordering efficiency for medical supplies. I worked with a subteam for focusing on the tracking and notification components, and the entire system is expected to generate an annual savings of $2 million through reduced waste.

name: Drug Discovery Research
